title: Valve’s year-old Steam Deck is on sale for the first time
description: Save 10 percent on any hardware configuration until March 23.

title: At least 67 people got botulism after trying to paralyze their stomachs
description: The aim was to slow digestion, but it instead led to life-threatening paralysis.

title: RIP (again): Google Glass will no longer be sold
description: Sales have already ceased, and support ends later this year.

title: AI imager Midjourney v5 stuns with photorealistic images—and 5-fingered hands
description: "Lack of dopamine hits, because the results are too perfect every time."

title: Authors risk losing copyright if AI content is not disclosed, US guidance says
description: Copyright Office will field public input during listening sessions this spring.

title: Federal agency hacked by 2 groups thanks to flaw that went unpatched for 4 years
description: A code-execution bug with a 9.8 severity rating gave control over agency's network.

title: Free data-center heat is allegedly saving a struggling public pool $24K a year
description: Deep Green deploys data centers in places that could use wasted data-center heat.

title: Large language models also work for protein structures
description: Training on raw protein sequences allows the AI to make inferences about structure.

title: FCC orders phone companies to block scam text messages
description: First robotext rule requires blocking of texts from invalid and unused numbers.

title: Moon-gate: Samsung fans are mad about AI-processed photos of the moon
description: When you know how the end result should look, how much AI is too much?

title: Microsoft 365’s AI-powered Copilot is like an omniscient version of Clippy
description: Each of the former Office apps will get AI-assisted automation features.

title: Where did FTX customer money go? Firm says Bankman-Fried took $2.2 billion
description: Another $839 million went to three executives who already pleaded guilty.

title: Belkin takes “a big step back” from Matter, endangering universal smart home standard
description: But there are still many devices from other companies that will support Matter.

title: Biden’s TikTok ultimatum: Sever ties with China or face US ban
description: China says there's no evidence that TikTok threatens US national security.

title: Star Citizen still hasn’t launched, but it’s facing server failures
description: RSI apologizes for "super rough start" to "persistent universe" alpha update.

title: Virgin Orbit pauses all operations
description: The company's financial woes worsened in the wake of failed January launch.

title: Nissan’s all-wheel drive Ariya is finally on sale, and Ars has driven it
description: It's been quite a wait for the AWD version, but it's finally ready for North America.

title: Chinese search giant launches AI chatbot with prerecorded demo
description: After demo, no one knows if Ernie can compete with ChatGPT.

title: 20 years later, Second Life is launching on mobile
description: The so-called proto-Metaverse will leap from desktops for the first time.

title: 68 now sickened, 4 lose eyeballs in outbreak linked to eyedrops
description: The extensively drug-resistant germ continues to strike amid recalls and warnings.
